sentences.sContent: If you think causation just ultimately is a matter of one thing following another, lawlike connexion' then why shouldn't there be lawlike connexions between mind and body.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you think causation just ultimately is a matter of one thing following another, lawlike connexion' then why shouldn't there be lawlike connexions between mind and body.
sentences.sCn: 如果你将因果关系最终理解为,某物质作为另一物质的结果而发生，我们把它称为“似律性连接”，what，we，call，‘,接下来我们不应该将它应用于大脑和肉体之间的关系。
